<script>
// Portfolio modal functionality
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Get all portfolio cards and modals
  const portfolioCards = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-card[data-modal]');
  const modals = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal');
  const closeButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal-close');
  const overlays = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal-overlay');

  const statusColors = {
    'planning': '#6f42c1',
    'in development': '#ff9800',
    'piloting': '#2196f3',
    'operational': '#2e8b57'
  };

  function applyStatus(badge, status) {
    if (!badge || !status) return;
    const normalizedStatus = status.trim().toLowerCase();
    badge.textContent = status;
    badge.style.backgroundColor = statusColors[normalizedStatus] || '#6c757d';
  }

  // Set status text and color for each card and its modal badge from a single source of truth.
  portfolioCards.forEach(card => {
    const status = card.getAttribute('data-status');
    const modalId = card.getAttribute('data-modal');
    const modal = modalId ? document.getElementById(modalId) : null;

    applyStatus(card.querySelector('.portfolio-status-badge'), status);

    if (modal) {
      applyStatus(modal.querySelector('.portfolio-status-badge'), status);
    }
  });

  // Open modal function
  function openModal(modalId) {
    const modal = document.getElementById(modalId);
    if (modal) {
      modal.classList.add('active');
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Prevent background scrolling
    }
  }

  // Close modal function
  function closeModal(modal) {
    if (modal) {
      modal.classList.remove('active');
      document.body.style.overflow = ''; // Restore scrolling
    }
  }

  // Close all modals function
  function closeAllModals() {
    modals.forEach(modal => {
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  }

  // Add click handlers to portfolio cards
  portfolioCards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      // Don't open modal if clicking on a link (links handle their own navigation)
      if (e.target.tagName === 'A' || e.target.closest('a')) {
        return;
      }
      const modalId = this.getAttribute('data-modal');
      if (modalId) {
        openModal(modalId);
      }
    });
  });

  // Add click handlers to close buttons
  closeButtons.forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const modal = this.closest('.portfolio-modal');
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  });

  // Close modal when clicking overlay
  overlays.forEach(overlay => {
    overlay.addEventListener('click', function() {
      const modal = this.closest('.portfolio-modal');
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  });

  // Close modal with Escape key
  document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
    if (e.key === 'Escape') {
      closeAllModals();
    }
  });
});
</script>
